mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.task_id , t1.task_no , t1.borrow_name , t1.borrow_dept , t1.borrow_number , t1.address , t1.estimate_date , t1.major , t1.link_man_kf , t1.link_phone_kf , t1.task_demand , t1.link_man_borrowed , t1.link_phone_borrowed , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_support_borrow_person_inf t1 left join BPM_CLIENT_HIST_PROCINST_V v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.TASK_ID like '%'||#{bean.taskId}||'%'
and t1.TASK_NO like '%'||#{bean.taskNo}||'%'
and t1.BORROW_NAME like '%'||#{bean.borrowName}||'%'
and t1.BORROW_DEPT like '%'||#{bean.borrowDept}||'%'
and t1.BORROW_NUMBER like '%'||#{bean.borrowNumber}||'%'
and t1.ADDRESS like '%'||#{bean.address}||'%'
and t1.ESTIMATE_DATE >= #{bean.estimateDateBegin}
and t1.ESTIMATE_DATE <= #{bean.estimateDateEnd}
and t1.MAJOR like '%'||#{bean.major}||'%'
and t1.LINK_MAN_KF like '%'||#{bean.linkManKf}||'%'
and t1.LINK_PHONE_KF like '%'||#{bean.linkPhoneKf}||'%'
and t1.TASK_DEMAND like '%'||#{bean.taskDemand}||'%'
and t1.LINK_MAN_BORROWED like '%'||#{bean.linkManBorrowed}||'%'
and t1.LINK_PHONE_BORROWED like '%'||#{bean.linkPhoneBorrowed}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like '%'||#{bean.attribute11}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like '%'||#{bean.attribute12}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like '%'||#{bean.attribute13}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like '%'||#{bean.attribute14}||'%'
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.task_id , t1.task_no , t1.borrow_name , t1.borrow_dept , t1.borrow_number , t1.address , t1.estimate_date , t1.major , t1.link_man_kf , t1.link_phone_kf , t1.task_demand , t1.link_man_borrowed , t1.link_phone_borrowed , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_support_borrow_person_inf t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into hdkf_support_borrow_person_inf
id,
task_id,
task_no,
borrow_name,
borrow_dept,
borrow_number,
address,
estimate_date,
major,
link_man_kf,
link_phone_kf,
task_demand,
link_man_borrowed,
link_phone_borrowed,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,
attribute_12,
attribute_13,
attribute_14,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{borrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{borrowDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update hdkf_support_borrow_person_inf t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_id =#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_no =#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.borrow_name =#{borrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.borrow_dept =#{borrowDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.borrow_number =#{borrowNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.address =#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.estimate_date =#{estimateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.major =#{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.link_man_kf =#{linkManKf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.link_phone_kf =#{linkPhoneKf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_demand =#{taskDemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.link_man_borrowed =#{linkManBorrowed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.link_phone_borrowed =#{linkPhoneBorrowed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

update hdkf_support_borrow_person_inf t1 set t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_id =#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_no =#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.borrow_name =#{borrowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.borrow_dept =#{borrowDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.borrow_number =#{borrowNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.address =#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.estimate_date =#{estimateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.major =#{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.link_man_kf =#{linkManKf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.link_phone_kf =#{linkPhoneKf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.task_demand =#{taskDemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.link_man_borrowed =#{linkManBorrowed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.link_phone_borrowed =#{linkPhoneBorrowed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
